name: L-valine,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating)
definition: L-Valine + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> N-Hydroxy-L-valine + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: first step of three-step reaction (see R08663, R10031+R10032+R10033)
